user@localhost:~/test$ singularity prep pause-scan 1 name
ID  Type  State  ErrorMessage  WorkerID  
1   scan  ready                <nil>     

user@localhost:~/test$ singularity --verbose prep pause-scan 1 name
ID  Type  State  ErrorMessage  ErrorStackTrace  WorkerID  AttachmentID  
1   scan  ready                                 <nil>     1
